title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 04/07/2022 INC#1832

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1832; 11:13PM; 3016 S Motor Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/35QxOvp; #CheviotHills; Total Patient Count Now = 5 (including trapped persons); FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E43 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA59 RA858 T92; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1832; 10:59PM; 3016 S Motor Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/35QxOvp; #CheviotHills; PRELIM: 2 vehicle traffic collision with two persons trapped.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E43 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA59 RA858 T92; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1050; 03:43PM; 1673 E 111th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/37vhLUt; #Watts; 43 Firefighters took just 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a well involved one-story detached garage to the rear of the property. Firefighter efforts prevented fire spread to nearby structures. Despite a roof collapse, no injuries have been reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 + LACoFD E41 SQ41; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1050; 03:21PM; 1673 E 111th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/37vhLUt; #Watts; Garage Fire Threatening Nearby Structures. PRELIM:; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck; INC#0316; 07:38AM; 1629 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KiFuWn; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: One pedestrian (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased and remains at scene after apparently being struck by (undetermined direction) Metro A (Blue) Line light rail train. No other physical injuries reported. Train Riders: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts for updated service information. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #924) Coroner and Metro Los Angeles.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E221 EM1 HR3 RA21 SQ21 T21; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0190; 04:51AM; 11005 W Hesby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xidwpQ; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was in a vacant, one story commercial building which had a small, single family dwelling attached to the rear. The fire extended (to varying degrees, extent of damage unknown at this time) to the attached and adjacent exposed building. Primary and secondary searches were clear. Cause of fire and $ loss are TBD. No further details. ; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E289 E60 E76 E86 RA60 RA860 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0190; 04:23AM; 11005 W Hesby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xidwpQ; North Hollywood; One story, vacant commercial building (40' x 70') with heavy fire and multiple exposed buildings. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E289 E60 E76 E86 RA60 RA860 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1256; 05:16PM; 150 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xadqAW; Fairfax; KNOCKDOWN: 33 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. While crews quickly extinguished the outside fire, additional crews entered both structures - ensuring the exposed, three-story senior living facility was clear. There was no fire only sprinkler activation on one balcony. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E58 E61 RA61 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1256; 04:50PM; 150 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xadqAW; Fairfax; An outside fire in the alley is exposing and possibly extending into structures on both sides of the alley. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Crews are knocking down the outside fire and making entry into both structures.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E58 E61 RA61 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0647; 12:20AM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2VigvOP; Chatsworth; All visible flames are extinguished and firefighters have handlines completely surrounding the burn area (contained). No structures were damaged and no injuries reported. This incident is located within LA County Fire jurisdiction and any questions are referred to that agency.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 BC17 CE84 CM42 DZ12 E104 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E8 E87 EM9 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA107 RA90 RI600 RM2 RM4 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
